metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20628 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC before 0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. It contains a Use-After-Free vulnerability in gf_m2ts_process_pmt in media_tools/mpegts.c that can cause a denial of service via a crafted MP4 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
